mapper.insert: insert into register_approval(manager_id, approval_time,status, enterprise_id) values(#{manager.id}, #{approvalTime}, #{status},#{enterprise.id});
mapper.update: update enterprise set status = '已审核' where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select * from enterprise where status = '待审核';
select register_approval.id, manager_id, enterprise_id, approval_time, status from register_approval;
select register_approval.id, manager_id, enterprise_id, approval_time, status from register_approval where status = #{status};
